name.description:
The name of the person in the avatar.

- if `src` has loaded, the name will be used as the `alt` attribute of the `img`
- If `src` is not loaded, the name will be used to create the initials

presence.description:
The presence status of the person

If set will add an AvatarBadge with color configured in `Presence`
Default presence options:
- online
- offline
- busy
- dnd
- away

presenceIcon.description: The icon shown in the AvatarBadge

isOutOfOffice.description: Indicates that a person is out of office. Changes the presence badge style.

label.description: Primary label of the persona, defaults to the name

secondaryLabel.description:
Secondary label, usually the role of the person
Only visible from md size and up.

tertiaryLabel.description:
Tertiary label, usually the status of the person.
Only visible from lg size and up.

hideDetails.description: Hide the persona details next to the avatar.

outOfOffice.description: Indicates that a person is out of office. Changes the presence badge style.
